name: League Of Darkness - Scarecrow
description:
Help Scarecrow become part of the League Of Darkness. Defeat all the waves to earn the title of a League Of Darkness Scarecrow. Attack the opponent to defeat them, make sure to collect loot (it replenishes your health).  Tip: the back is an unprotected area. Opponents won't give you their back that easily.

The metal guitar music was created by me as well.

Controls:

  • Punch Left - Left mouse click
  • Punch Right - Right mouse click
  • Kick - 'C'
  • Jump - Space
  • Left shift - Run
